operations.summary: Returns a list of all Change Subscription objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

responseMessages.message: The requested operation succeeded
The requested operation succeeded and no further information has been provided, such as in the case of a DELETE operation.
The request contents are incorrectly formatted or the request was made for an invalid API version.
The requester cannot be authenticated
The requester does not have the required privileges or another constraint failed, such as attempting to delete an edit-only object.
The requested path does not refer to an existing object or object relation.

The requested operation could not be performed due to the current state of the configuration. For example, an attempt was made to create an object that already exists or an attempt was made to delete an object that is referred to by another object.
The request is such that the Accept header does not indicate that JSON is an acceptable format for a response.
The server encountered an unexpected error.

operations.summary: Add a new Change Subscription to the config

parameters.description: Change Subscription to add
parameters.name: add-change-subscription-request
attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

parameters.name: applyChangeTo
parameters.description: Specify whether to apply this configuration change to a single server or the whole server group. This does not apply to mirrored subtree objects

subscriptionName.description: Name of the new Change Subscription

requestCriteria.description: Specifies a set of request criteria that must match the request associated with an operation in order for that operation to be processed by a change subscription handler.

resultCriteria.description: Specifies a set of result criteria that must match the result associated with an operation in order for that operation to be processed by a change subscription handler.

expirationTime.description: Specifies a timestamp that provides an expiration time for this change subscription. If an expiration time is provided, then the change subscription will not be active after that time has passed.

description.description: A description for this Change Subscription

connectionCriteria.description: Specifies a set of connection criteria that must match the client connection associated with an operation in order for that operation to be processed by a change subscription handler.
